critical_dependencies.reason: Primary data provider for portfolio, positions, prices, signals - core functionality depends on this context
Only trading provider with real execution capability - entire trading flow depends on this service
Wrapper view that delegates all functionality - tight coupling by design
Hub aggregates three critical views - navigation and composition dependency
Real-time market updates essential for accurate market analysis
Live scanner updates require WebSocket connection for real-time signal feeds
Backtest parameters shared across application for consistent analysis
Strategy simulation and live preview entirely dependent on scoring API
Position management requires backend API for close, reduce, reverse operations
Portfolio functionality delegated to specialized components

summary.overall_recommendation: The application has a solid foundation with 6 high-scoring views (8/10) ready for production. Critical path: Dashboard → Market Analysis → Scanner → Futures Trading → Positions → Portfolio works well. Key issues: (1) ZERO unit tests across all views - critical gap for production readiness, (2) TradingView is disabled/stub (SPOT not implemented), (3) Several views use mock or default data (RiskView, TrainingView simulation), (4) Some advanced features incomplete (StrategyBuilderView). IMMEDIATE ACTION: Add comprehensive test coverage (currently at ~0%, needs 80%+), validate all risk/analysis calculations, implement or remove disabled views. Recommended focus: Keep high-quality views (Dashboard, Scanner, FuturesTradingView, TradingHubView), improve mid-tier views (ChartingView, MarketView), and decide on low-scoring views (TradingView - remove?, StrategyBuilderView - complete or deprecate?).

critical_testing_gaps: No unit tests for any view components
No integration tests for context providers
Only 1 basic e2e smoke test exists
No security tests for trading views

duplicated_functionality.issue: Four trading views with overlapping functionality; TradingView is disabled, FuturesTradingView is production-ready, UnifiedTradingView wraps it, EnhancedTradingView adds signal insight - consolidation needed
Three risk views with different scopes but overlapping features - needs clear separation or consolidation
Three strategy views with unclear boundaries - StrategyLabView is feature-rich, StrategyBuilderView is minimal, StrategyInsightsView shows pipeline results

architecture_violations.issue: Disabled view still in routing table - should be removed or fully implemented
Uses hardcoded mock data instead of integrating with portfolio/positions context
Simulation logic in view layer should be in service layer; view contains business logic
